ActiveProfileMetric.name: ActiveProfileMetric
ActiveProfileMetric.description: Represents the profile associated with the active, assigned, and purchased user licenses.

ActiveUserCount.description: Number of users assigned this profile who have logged in within the last 30 days.

AssignedUserCount.description: Number of users assigned this profile.

MetricsDate.description: Date that profile metrics were collected.

UserLicenseId.description: The ID of the user license.
